FullDescription: A plaster manufacturer produces the Bodywallet so you know that this is a safe product that you can use. Made from a breathable fleece material with a ziplock-type closure, the wallet has an adhesive backing to secure it to your skin and keep your cards and money hidden from plain sight. Directions For Use:- Remove the backing paper from the adhesive side.- Stick the Body Wallet on a suitable area of your skin.- Use and fill the Body Wallet.- Remove the Body Wallet if you do not need it anymore.- The Body Wallet cannot be re-attached once removed from the body. Important:- Do not stick onto mucous membranes, wounds, mouth or nose.- Do not apply in case of skin diseases.- Should skin irritations occur, please remove the Bodywallet immediately.- Please keep out of reach of children, in a cool, dry place, out of direct sunlight.- Wear for one hour before filling.- Recommended use within one year after the date of purchase content will get wet when the Bodywallet is exposed to water.- Use of the Body Wallet is at your own risk.

ProductName: Legend Sublimated Parasol Single Pole - 2m x 2m
FullDescription: The Legend Sublimated Parasol Single Pole - 2m x 2m is designed to provide both a radiant display to draw clients in and provide those clients with a shaded environment to enjoy your product under! Perfect for those outdoor events. Includes a corrosion-resistant frame made from aluminium, PP and steel with a centre hub and locking pin to make sure your frame stays open and a large waterproof polyester gazebo fabric cover that can be fully branded on a single side and has reinforced pockets to secure onto the frame. Includes a black polyester Oxford fabric slipcover to slide over your closed parasol to protect it from the elements and dirt. Part of the Legend range. Did You Know?You can purchase separate skins for this product, so when you want to update your banner all you need is a new skin. Have a look at the Parasol 2m x 2m Replacement Skin here Please Note:Base not included. Image is for display purposes only. If you're looking for a sturdy base, try the Parasol Concrete Base- Overexposure to direct and intense sunlight can reduce the longevity of the print. This item comes with a 3-month limited print fade warranty.

FullDescription: The Plantable Paper Seed Kits are all the rage right now and will look great anywhere, in your house or office! Made from recycled paper, the seed kits contain an origami envelope with either herbs or flower seeds for you to plant, and comes with a biodegradable pot, which makes it easy to start your kit off in the pot and then transfer it to something bigger when it blossoms! Perfect as a gift for any occasion. Packaged with a belly band that can be branded to add a personal touch, making it a perfect gift for the upcoming summer season. Choose between an option of herbs, flowers or vegetables: HerbsCompanion Mix - Basil & TomatoHerb Mix - Basil, Oregano & ThymeLimited - Rocket, Basil, Chamomile FlowersFlower Mix - Alyssum, Poppies, Forget Me Not, Snapdragon, Lavender, Marigold, Baby’s Breath, Vygies, African DaisiesIndigenous Mix - Vygies & African Daisies VegetablesVeggie Mix - Carrot & LettuceLimited - Tomato, Chilli, Green Pepper How To Plant- Place the soil pod on a plate and pour 40ml of water over it.- Watch the soil pod absorb the water and expand.- Once the water has been absorbed, gently crumble the soil and place some into the pot, filling about 3/4 of the way.- Place the sheet of seed paper and cover it with the remaining soil.- Now put your pot in a sunny spot and remember to water daily.- When your seed starts to flourish, carefully replant it into a larger pot or find a spot in the garden to watch it grow. Please Note: Price displayed is per unit. Minimum Order Quantity: 30 Units Price Includes: 1 Position Full-Colour Print on BELLY BAND (Setup Fees Apply)

Herbs Companion Mix - Basil & Tomato Herb Mix - Basil, Oregano & Thyme Limited - Rocket, Basil, Chamomile Flowers Flower Mix - Alyssum, Poppies, Forget Me Not, Snapdragon, Lavender, Marigold, Baby’s Breath, Vygies, African Daisies Indigenous Mix - Vygies & African Daisies Vegetables Veggie Mix - Carrot & Lettuce Limited - Tomato, Chilli, Green Pepper

Vegetables Veggie Mix - Carrot & Lettuce Limited - Tomato, Chilli, Green Pepper

How To Plant - Place the soil pod on a plate and pour 40ml of water over it. - Watch the soil pod absorb the water and expand. - Once the water has been absorbed, gently crumble the soil and place some into the pot, filling about 3/4 of the way. - Place the sheet of seed paper and cover it with the remaining soil. - Now put your pot in a sunny spot and remember to water daily. - When your seed starts to flourish, carefully replant it into a larger pot or find a spot in the garden to watch it grow.

The Plantable Paper Flyer - A6 is an eco-friendly way to spread the word. Made from 100% recycled paper, the flyers are embedded with seeds for either herbs or flowers, which allows you to plant the flyer and watch it grow in your garden, instead of throwing it away or putting it in a drawer. The best feature about these flyers is that even if they end up as litter - like they so often do - they will simply decompose or grow into something beautiful! A unique way to showcase your brand and be remembered. Choose between an option of herbs, flowers or vegetables: Herbs- Companion Mix: Basil & Tomato- Herb Mix: Basil, Oregano & Thyme- Enquire About The Limited Range: Rocket, Basil, Chamomile Flowers- Flower Mix: Alyssum, Poppies, Forget Me Not, Snapdragon, Lavender, Marigold, Baby’s Breath, Vygies, African Daisies- Indigenous Mix: Vygies & African Daisies- Forget-Me-Not: These can take up to a year to show off their flowers! Vegetables- Veggie Mix: Carrot & Lettuce- Enquire About The Limited Range: Tomato, Chilli, Green Pepper How To Plant- Scrunch up and moisten the paper.- Prepare and moisten some weed-free soil.- Cover the seeded paper with some soil.- Place in a sunny spot and water often to keep moist during germination but don’t drown the seeds.- Watch your little plants grow from paper!
